tableTopics: If you could outlaw one vegetable, what would it be?
quoteDay: The more you give away, the more happy you become. Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Suess

tableTopics: What is your favorite memory, why?
quoteDay: No one is perfect and that is why pencils have erasers.
author: Wolfgang Riebe

tableTopics: What makes someone a good friend?
quoteDay: Only surround yourself with people who will lift you higher.
author: Oprah Winfrey

tableTopics: When was the last time you helped your parents?
quoteDay: Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts.
author: Charles Dickens

tableTopics: Share something you admire about someone sitting at the table.
author: Woodrow Wilson

tableTopics: Is there anything you wish you had done differently today?
quoteDay: Your behavior is a choice; it is not who you are
author: Vanessa Diffenbaugh

tableTopics: If you could only have one wish, what would it be and Why?
quoteDay: Kindness and politeness are not overrated at all. They are underused.
author: Tommy Lee Jones

tableTopics: Who is one of your heroes and why do they insprire you?
quoteDay: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

tableTopics: What is something you are looking forward to this week?
quoteDay: Being different is NOT a bad thing. It means you are BRAVE enough to be yourself.
author: Luna Lovegood

tableTopics: Can you remember a time you had a really good day? What made it so good?
quoteDay: Today is your day.Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.
author: Dr.Seuss

tableTopics: If you could be one age for the rest of your life, what age would you be? Why?
quoteDay: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more you learn, the more places you will go!
author: Dr.Seuss
